flawed_nl_solution:
The purchases he made totaled $30 + $10 + $5 = $<<30+10+5=54>>54
He should pay $54, but he only paid $43, so $54 - $43 = $<<54-43=11>>11 was the discount they gave him
#### 11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 54. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
